column4: hello. how could I use a free static host (with a client running on my comp) for dynamic ip ?
hello. is there a way to install no-ip.org client with the apt-get or synaptic way? so it could be updated when there are updates for it ?
i use dyndns, and it only check for ip changes when you boot the computer or when you tell it specifically to do so. i don't know about how no-ip functions
